ai-patthana23.25:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana23.25:1.1_0: They don’t give rise to rapture.
ai-patthana23.25:1.1_2: whose majority has not been shared.
ai-patthana23.25:2.1_0: They don’t give rise to rapture.
ai-patthana23.25:2.1_2: whose majority has not been shared.
ai-patthana23.25:3.1_0: And they don’t clearly see the cause or condition for rapture and bliss born of immersion.
ai-patthana23.25:3.1_2: These are the eight shares of robe-cloth that are twenty-foured has nothing left over.
